condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.4 Planning, and Monitoring and Evaluation

description.narrative: The PME team supported the finalization of the Country Programme Document, as well as the independent Country Programme Evaluation that informed the CPD. The CPD was directly informed by beneficiary feedback, as well as other stakeholders and is fully aligned with the UN Strategic Development Cooperation Framework. UCO is strengthening it's field monitoring and worked on remote monitoring during the COVID-19 pandemic. Furthermore, the team increased outreach to donors. A number of trainings were organised to support staff to respond to COVID-19 (e.g. reprogramming). Furthermore, in response to COVID UNICEF Uganda made active efforts to expand the donor base. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/08/2020
